theRhythmGirl:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

theRhythmGirl:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
theRhythmGirl:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

theRhythmGirl:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
Whenever you play a card, draw

theRhythmGirl:QuarterNote.NAME: Quarter Note
DESCRIPTIONS: After you play a card, gain #b1 #yBeat.

theRhythmGirl:TimeSignature44.NAME: 4/4 Time Signature
theRhythmGirl:TimeSignature44.FLAVOR: Easy enough. Feel free to clap along.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, set your #yBeat to #b1. Whenever you have more than #b4 #yBeat, lose #b4 #yBeat and gain #b1 #yMeasure.
